meanings.definition: A person who steers a ship or boat.
meanings.sent1: The helmsmen guided the ship safely through the storm.
meanings.sent2: The experienced helmsmen navigated the boat through the narrow channel.
meanings.sent3: The helmsmen skillfully avoided the rocks, much to the relief of the passengers.
meanings.sent4: Like skilled helmsmen, they steered the project towards success.
meanings.sent5: The helmsmen's steady hand on the wheel kept the vessel on course.

meanings.definition: A person who is in charge or control.
meanings.sent1: The helmsmen of the company made important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The helmsmen of the team led with confidence and determination.
meanings.sent3: The helmsmen of the household always knew how to keep things running smoothly.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the helmsmen of the group was a wise and respected character.
meanings.sent5: The helmsmen of the organization were respected for their leadership skills.
